name: translation-maker
description: Using a JSON definition file, easily create new translations.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:generate && npm run build:validate && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:generate: mkdir -p dist && babel generate.js --presets es2015 --out-file dist/generate.es5.js
scripts.build:validate: mkdir -p dist && babel validate-translation.js --presets es2015 --out-file dist/validate-translation.es5.js
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p dist && cp generate.js dist/generate.js && cp validate-translation.js dist/validate-translation.js

author: saibotsivad
